author: RTÉ News
title: Trump recommends face covering to stop virus
description: President Trump has announced new government recommendations for all Americans to wear masks when they go outside to help to stop the spread of the COVID-19 coronavirus.
content:
President Trump has announced new government recommendations for all Americans to wear masks when they go outside to help to stop the spread of the COVID-19 coronavirus.
